title: Revolutionary Communist Party – Red Trench
text:
Revolutionary Communist Party – Red Trench (in <a href="Spanish%20language">Spanish</a>: "Partido Comunista Revolucionario - Trinchera Roja") was a <a href="communist%20party">communist party</a> in <a href="Peru">Peru</a>. PCR-TR was formed in 1977, through a split in the <a href="Revolutionary%20Communist%20Party%20%28Peru%29">PCR</a>. PCR-TR was led by <a href="Agust%C3%ADn%20Haya%20de%20la%20Torre">Agustín Haya de la Torre</a> and Jorge Nieto.
PCR-TR joined the <a href="Popular%20Democratic%20Union%20%28Peru%29">UDP</a>.
In 1984 it became one of the founding organizations of <a href="Mariateguist%20Unified%20Party">Mariateguist Unified Party</a> (PUM).
